body:
This has been discussed recently. Search for "air wall".
But as alternative solution i added a HB_EnergySimPar component and set the solarDistribution_ input to 1 (Full Exterior) instead of the default (Full Exterior and Interior). The last one don't like convex zones, but still is giving you results. They can be good enough even though the error. The setting that i gave here is less strict, takes direct beam only.
See green groups in the attached.
-A.
